Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Respiratory and Thoracic Disorder/Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Heart Disorder/Left Ventricular Systolic Dysfunction
Record.Description: An abnormal performance of the left ventricle with an ejection fraction equal to or less than 0.40 (40%).
